Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: And speaking of people not being part of either group...
Thomas B: During the investigation i found a way to finally make contact with the fan who send me the message.
Thomas B: Well, sort of... But i finally managed to speak with them.
Thomas B: And here is where the problem actually begins.
Thomas B: They wanted me to help them find something in the chat, something that was rumored to exist.
Thomas B: 'The Machine Of Server 3', a supposed algorithm done by an user with the tools that the chat offers.
Thomas B: In exchange, they would pay me and also give me the opportunity to cover the subject of the discovery on my channel.
Thomas B: But... There is also something else to make sure their offer was not rejected...
Thomas B: If i rejected the offer, people would get to know... Really personal information about me...
Thomas B: That only means one thing...

Elections.CandidateName: He knows me from way back
It's a member inside this chat
